titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

p.hi: I worked at a sermon on Bishop Lightfoot for next Sunday's Dedication anniversary at St. Ignatius, Sunderland of which he was the donor. Then I attended a meeting of the Sherburn Trustees. Col. Darwin and Capt. Roberts also were there. I attended Evensong in the Cathedral.
